title: COVID-19 Response
content:
Our health-compromised neighbors without a home are already vulnerable to sickness, weather, exhaustion and malnutrition. Regardless of age, many of these members of our community are considered medically geriatric resulting in an average age expectancy of about 50 years old.

We receive no government funding, so we are especially dependent on your support to provide care 24/7 for our neighbors in great need.

Thank you for your compassionate partnership!
